query: What position did Simon English hold in the 2008 general election?
gold_answer: He became deputy prime minister and minister of finance.
reasoning: Answer A states that Simon English became 'deputy prime minister and minister of finance,' which includes both his title as deputy prime minister and an additional role as minister of finance. Answer B simply states 'Deputy Prime Minister,' which is a part of the information in Answer A. Since Answer B accurately reflects one of the positions mentioned in Answer A without contradicting it, the two answers can be considered semantically equivalent in the context of the query.
